name: TONSSIMIN CHAP
description: The system, a wheel that turns in a predefined direction acts on the citizen and forces him to follow a movement. In this #kenneyjam game whose theme is rotation, I share with you the realities of my home where we are not forced by the system to turn in its direction and just be content to dodge the problems and to expect it still at regular intervals of time hence the name of the game "TONSSIMIN CHAP" which means with us "escape that quickly". I wish you have a good time with.
